# isConnected

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether a device is currently connected to the system and available for use.

## Declaration

```swift
var isConnected: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] for a particular capture device instance, it doesn’t become [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] again. If the same physical device reconnects, the system represents it as a new capture device instance.

You can key-value observe this property value to monitor when a device is no longer available.

## Accessing device state

- **isSuspended**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the device is in a suspended state.
- **isInUseByAnotherApplication**: A Boolean value that indicates whether another app is using the device.
